item.description:
Join Troy for this years Delaney's 7th Annual Chili Cook-Off & Beer Festival!

If you like beer, you'll love Delaney's. This is a great event for the day after the pub crawl!

Tickets are $35 in Advance and $40 the day of.  You get to taste all of the Beers and Chili available, and two additional Pints of your choice!  (The website lists there to be over 100 beers available from all over the world!)  All proceeds go to benefit the local cancer charities.

Look for Troy at the Event, he will be there starting at 1pm and can be reached at 205-286-8769 or by e-mail at rtnall@gmail.com .  Thanks Troy!

Please purchase your own tickets.  You can order ahead of time using credit card by calling Delaney's at 203-397-5494.

The event runs from 1pm till 5pm

Hope to see you there!

For more information on Delaney's, you can also visit their website.

Have a great recipe and want to compete? Email Delaney's at amanda@delaneystaproom.com and see if you can join in the fun!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Troy, if you can't find him he can be contacted by cell at 205-286-8769.
item.name: Delaney's Beer Festival and Chili Cook-off
